item.description:
What better way to celebrate the weekend than with beer and good friends? Bonus: this Sunday we're meeting at a great pool hall. We can all thank Patrick S. for the awesome suggestion. They also have dart boards, so bring your darts if you're interested. (I know I'm bringing mine!)
Flattop Johnny's features an extensive microbrew list, and surprisingly inexpensive (and tasty) food.
You can check them out at http://flattopjohnnys...
Come see old friends, or come for the first time and make some new friends!
item.name: Sunday Funday! Billiards and Beer @ Flattop Johnny's
